PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ControllerTypeMultiPosition
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for discrete inputs, outputs, and values within a programmable logic controller. HISTORY: New in IFC4, replaces Pset_MultiStateInput and Pset_MultiStateOutput.

PropertyDef.Name: ControlType
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of signal modification effected and applicable ports:\X\0D \X\0D INPUT: Controller element is a dedicated input.\X\0D OUTPUT: Controller element is a dedicated output.\X\0D VARIABLE: Controller element is an in-memory variable.

PropertyDef.Name: Labels
PropertyDef.Definition: Table mapping values to labels, where each entry corresponds to an integer within the ValueRange.

PropertyDef.Name: Range
PropertyDef.Definition: The physical range of values supported by the device.

PropertyDef.Name: Value
PropertyDef.Definition: The expected range and default value. The LowerLimitValue and UpperLimitValue must fall within the physical Range.
